I agree with @alicetragedy. However @katrin-k, concerning colors and inspiration: I'm personally bad with coming up with color schemes, so I usually use tools for that. I can highly recommend coolors.co - you can also import images there to extract a color scheme.

Besides that (cc @ramonh 😂 ), there's bootflat, an extension to bootstrap, "flattifying" it. You can also look at their button design + colors (I think they're both pretty good).

body:
I agree with @alicetragedy. However @katrin-k, concerning colors and inspiration: I'm personally bad with coming up with color schemes, so I usually use tools for that. I can highly recommend [coolors.co](https://coolors.co/) - you can also import images there to extract a color scheme.

Besides that (cc @ramonh 😂 ), there's [bootflat](http://bootflat.github.io/), an extension to bootstrap, _"flattifying"_ it. You can also look at their button design + colors (I think they're both pretty good).
